name: CHAOS and CONFUSION? Flying KLM Business Class to Canada
description:
I took the first flight to Canada after the borders opened, to try out KLM's Business Class onboard their Boeing 787-10. Rather predictably, it was a day of chaos, confusion and delays - but I was surprised by the way KLM handled it. 

OFFICIAL NOEL MERCH: www.noelphilips.com
